name: Daisy-Dew: Dream Defender
description:
For the BuddyUp Winter Jam 2023, we (Team-2) made this game about a pillow, chasing dream clouds and keeping Daisy sleeping tight throughout the night.

The jam theme is 'soft'.
Narrative:
You're playing Daisy-Dew, a soft and warm pillow, protecting Dewie as he sleeps. Catch the dreamy clouds and chase away nightmares by closing the doors and windows when they slam open.
Controls:
AD | LR: Movement
Space: Jump (double-space to double-jump)
Credits:
  • Game Design: Everyone!
  • 2D Art: Abby
  • 3D Art: AleksMcFly
  • Production & Testing: Archivist Owl
  • Coding: Guanomancer
  • Narrative: Stipes & Emsterdam
  • Music: Hunterclarg
  • Sound FX: Nikth
